# Motivation

```{r}

library(plotly)
library(datasauRus)

datasaurus_dozen[["dataset"]] <- factor(datasaurus_dozen[["dataset"]],
  levels = c("away", 
    "high_lines", "wide_lines", 
    "h_lines", "v_lines", 
    "slant_down", "slant_up",
    "dots", 
    "circle",
    "bullseye",
    "x_shape",
    "star",
    "dino"))


ax <- list(
  title = "",
  zeroline = FALSE,
  showline = FALSE,
  showticklabels = FALSE,
  showgrid = FALSE
)

plot_ly(datasaurus_dozen, 
    x = ~x, 
    y = ~y, 
    frame = ~dataset, 
    mode = "markers",
    type = "scatter",
    showlegend = FALSE) %>%
    layout(xaxis = ax, yaxis = ax) %>%
    animation_opts(frame = 5000, transition = 500)

```
